headline: How DraftKings’ CFTC-Regulated Predictions Platform Accessing Non-Sportsbook States Has Changed Its Investment Story (DKNG)
summary: DraftKings recently launched DraftKings Predictions, a standalone CFTC-regulated app and web platform that lets eligible U.S. customers trade event contracts on sports, finance, and other real-world outcomes across 38 states, including large markets like California, Florida, Georgia, and Texas. By moving into federally regulated prediction markets and connecting to exchanges like CME Group, DraftKings is extending its reach beyond traditional sportsbooks and into states where online sports...
